mapper.insert:
insert all into MEMBER(NAME,U_ID,PWD,DEPT,O_CODE,ADDRESS,GENDER,RESIDENT,MAIL,C_PHONE,PHONE,SALARY,SALARYDATE,BIRTH,ENTRY,POSITION) values(#{name},#{uid},#{pwd},#{dept},#{oCode},#{address},#{gender},#{resident},#{mail},#{cPhone},#{phone},#{salary},#{salaryDate},#{birth},#{entry},#{position})
into FAMILY(U_ID,F_RELATION,F_NAME,F_BIRTH,F_PHONE,F_JOB,F_WITH) values (#{family.uid},#{item.family.fRelation},#{item.family.fName},#{item.family.fBirth},#{item.family.fPhone},#{item.family.fJob},#{item.family.fWith})
into DEGREE(U_ID,D_SCHOOL,D_MAJOR,D_DEGREE,D_GRADUATED,D_START,D_END) values(#{degree.uid},#{degree.dSchool},#{degree.dMajor},#{degree.dDegree},#{degree.dGraduated},#{degree.dStart},#{degree.dEnd})
into CAREER(U_ID,C_RECTAL,C_TASK,C_START,C_END) values (#{career.uid},#{item.career.cRectal},#{item.career.cTask},#{item.career.cStart},#{item.career.cEnd})
into CERTIFICATE(U_ID,CE_NAME,CE_ISSUER,CE_DATE) values (#{certificate.uid},#{item.certificate.ceName},#{item.certificate.ceIssuer},#{item.certificate.ceDate})
into APPREAISAL (U_ID,O_CODE) values (#{appreaisal.uid},#{appreaisal.oCode}) into TRANSFER (U_ID,O_CODE) values (#{Transfer.uid},#{Transfer.oCode}) into PRIZE (U_ID) values (#{prize.uid}) select * from DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, U_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{name} AND MAIL = #{mail}
SELECT NAME, PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE U_ID = #{uid} AND NAME = #{name} AND MAIL = #{mail}
select o.O_NAME,m.* from member m left join Organization o ON m.O_CODE = o.O_CODE
select o.O_NAME,m.* from member m left join Organization o ON m.O_CODE = o.O_CODE where O_NAME = #{okeyword}
select * from MEMBER where DEPT like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
